scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd apps/api && uv venv && uv pip install fastapi uvicorn[standard] pydantic pydantic-settings httpx ruff basedpyright pytest pytest-asyncio pytest-cov && cd ../..
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && uv run python main.py
scripts.format: pnpm run format:web && pnpm run format:api
scripts.format:api: cd apps/api && uv run ruff format .
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:web && pnpm run lint:api
scripts.lint:api: cd apps/api && uv run ruff check .
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:web && pnpm run typecheck:api
scripts.check: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck
scripts.fix: pnpm run format && cd apps/api && uv run ruff check . --fix
